Contributor: Welsh, H. Devitt, artist.; United States. Committee on Public Information, publisher.;
Note: Signed "H. Devitt Welsh." Date based on America's participation in the war. Orientation: Vertical.
Description: Text says messages from Washington are from a theater which has been appointed by the government to receive these messages. And the privilege of its stage has been granted to the Four Minute Men. Illustration shows Independence Hall in Philadelphia.
Digital Collection: Allied Posters of World War I

Title: 4 Minute Men
